summary: Lets you craft unenchanted versions of the Dawnguard vampire amulets and rings of power (both left and right hand rings) as well as 2 additional color variations that were only available via console in the base game.
descriptionHtml:
Lets you craft unenchanted versions of the Dawnguard vampire amulets and rings of power (both left and right hand rings) as well as 2 additional color variations that were only available via console in the base game.

Obviously this requires Dawnguard.

While no assets from Left Hand Rings were used, I would like to credit duggelz for his handy guide on how to make rings left handed.

Saieden Mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51626/?/] Alternate Heljarchen Kitchen Wing [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51619/?/] Hearthfire Coffin Cubby [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51571/?/] Simple Hearthfire Attics [/url]
[color=#00FF00][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56972/?] Craftable Dawnguard Vampire Jewelry [/url][/color]
[color=#00FF00][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55380/?] Skygge - A Skaal Village Player House [/url][/color]
author: Saieden
